duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist and consult with customers on company products and services to provide a world-class sales and service experience.
Demonstrate and share product and sales know-how with customers, providing product demonstrations and educating customers on product capabilities.
Listen to and evaluate customer needs, providing appropriate solutions and achieving sales and customer experience goals.
Perform operational and administrative tasks, onboarding activities, and resolve customer issues as appropriate.
Demonstrate sales excellence and professionalism, comply with company policies and procedures, and actively engage in team huddles and learning.
Work a flexible schedule, carry and lift up to 25 pound boxes, and perform other duties as assigned.
